name: Cyberplant
description:
In 2088 continuous experiments in quantum calculated optogenetics on plants gives not only full knowledge of their level of sentience and a way for computers and humans to communicate with them but also for plants to control machines and have their own bionic parts.Concept developed based on the idea of sentient plant civilization called Skroderiders from the book “Fire Upon the Deep” by sci-fi writer Vernor Vinge.

Collectors will receive an Unlockable Content that includes a private access to download the glb file and view the cyberplant in Augmented Reality & Virtual Reality.

Cyberplant is modeled entirely in VR using Gravity Sketch
